Vevox is an audience engagement tool acquired by TU Delft as the campus-wide solution for synchronous (live) polling. This is an alternative to similar tools such as Slido and Mentimeter.

## **More information**

-   <https://www.tudelft.nl/teaching-support/educational-tools/vevox>
